content.body: oh I wonder what's the motivation for BigInt TAs

content.body: I thought TA is for low level calculations, is there a cross-platform representation (like IEEE floating points) for BigInt?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I thought TA is for low level calculations, is there a cross-platform representation (like IEEE floating points) for BigInt?

content.body: oh the TAs aren't actually storing BigInts, they're storing (u)int64
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: oh the TAs aren't actually storing BigInts, they're storing (u)int64

content.body: but to get the values out / or assign into them we need to put them into BigInts

content.body: since Numbers don't have enough bits to hold int64s
